column1: Entity   An entity in an ER Model is a real_world entity having properties called attributes  Every attribute is defined by its set of values called domain  For example
column3: a student is considered as an entity  Student has various attributes like name

column1: Relationship   The logical association among entities is called relationship  Relationships are mapped with entities in various ways  Mapping cardinalities define the number of association between two entities  Mapping cardinalities   one to one one to many many to one many to many
